title: PlayStation Buys Bungie - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.31.22
description:
Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on their first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDAFUNNY.

Blessing is joined by special guest Cam Hawkins to talk Sony buying Bungie, Kingdom Hearts, Final Fantasy VII Remake, Quantic Dream, and a whole bunch more in a PACKED news day!

Follow Cam: https://twitter.com/CamFinalMix

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
We’re recording PSILY on Patreon later today. You can catch that live if you’re a Patreon Supporter or catch the episode tomorrow on youtube and podcast services around the globe for the PlayStation conversation that you love.
TODAY (January 31st) at 3 pm PT on twitch.tv/andycortez, the Nitro Rifle will be competing against other streamers in The TurboTax Expert Invitational. Will he get unlucky and have to play Overcooked? Or will his FPS skills come into play with Halo or Apex Legends? Tune in to twitch.tv/andycortez at 3pm PT to find out and cheer him on!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes),Black Jack, &  Pranksy
The Roper Report   -
00:06:39 - Sony buying Bungie for $3.6 billion
00:28:40 - Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 2 is planned for reveal this year, producer confirms - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:39:40 -  Ad  
00:40:55 - Star Wars Eclipse is reportedly inspired by The Last of Us - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:46:04 -  Quantic Dream’s PS4 tech demo is reportedly coming to PS5 as ‘Dreamland’ - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:50:40 - MLB The Show will once again be coming to Game Pass - News.xbox.com
00:55:20 - ‘It Takes Two’ is getting adapted to film & tv - Joe Otterson @ Variety
01:04:00 - Out today
01:05:33 - You‘re Wrong
